sn12.46:1.2: Atha kho annataro brahmano yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavata saddhim sammodi.
sn12.46:1.3: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho so brahmano bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn12.46:2.1: “Kim nu kho, bho gotama, so karoti so patisamvedayati”ti?
sn12.46:2.2: “‘So karoti so patisamvedayati’ti kho, brahmana, ayameko anto”.
sn12.46:3.1: “Kim pana, bho gotama, anno karoti, anno patisamvedayati”ti?
sn12.46:3.2: “‘Anno karoti, anno patisamvedayati’ti kho, brahmana, ayam dutiyo anto.
sn12.46:3.3: Ete te, brahmana, ubho ante anupagamma majjhena tathagato dhammam deseti:
sn12.46:4.1: Evam vutte, so brahmano bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn12.46:4.3: upasakam mam bhavam gotamo dharetu ajjatagge panupetam saranam gatan”ti.
